channel.title: Abouts on YMPP
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on YMPP

item.title: About
item.description: Dear Reader, I am Yin Minn Pa Pa, originally from Myanmar and currently working at Japan as security researcher. I finished my Ph.D in engineering from Yokohama National University, Japan. My research interests include: Network security Malware Analysis IoT security Web security This site is made to document what I learnt and share it to burmese learners. I would be happy if someone learn something from here. Thanks for reading!
